ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 9 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Canon EOS Rebel T5i 18.0 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 3-inch Touchscreen and Full HD Movie Mode (Body) Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Zoom Lens
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Digital SLR Camera Holster Carrying Case with Pockets & Strap - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Focus DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - 5pc Lens Care & Cleaning Kit, includes; 1 soft fiber cloth, 5 cotton swabs, 1 cleaning fluid, 1 soft lens tissue paper, & 1 blower brush - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
